mapper.select: /* 게시글 가져오기 */ SELECT A.*, B.*, C.*, D.comtCnt FROM TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY A LEFT JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY_IMAGE B ON STUDY_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY_FILE C ON STUDY_SEQ = C.BOARD_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_SEQ, COUNT(COMT_SEQ) as 'comtCnt' FROM TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY_COMT GROUP BY BOARD_SEQ) D ON STUDY_SEQ = D.BOARD_SEQ WHERE STUDY_SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT STUDY_CATEGORY FROM TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY GROUP BY STUDY_CATEGORY ORDER BY STUDY_CATEGORY ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY ( STUDY_CATEGORY, STUDY_CODE_LANG, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_CONTENTS, STUDY_DATE, STUDY_HITS, STUDY_ENABLED ) VALUES ( #{category}, #{codeLang}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{date}, #{hits}, #{enabled} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY SET STUDY_CATEGORY = #{category}, STUDY_CODE_LANG = #{codeLang}, STUDY_TITLE = #{title}, STUDY_CONTENTS = #{contents}, STUDY_DATE = #{date}, STUDY_HITS = #{hits}, STUDY_ENABLED = #{enabled} WHERE STUDY_SEQ = #{seq}
